analysis.description:
RakugoCrowdsale.rate (/unique_chucks/12/0x7a134ef9a957f2a8af3bd4a4cad2dbc6a0de7f8a.sol#560) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.rate (/unique_chucks/12/0x7a134ef9a957f2a8af3bd4a4cad2dbc6a0de7f8a.sol#370)

Reentrancy in RakugoCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/12/0x7a134ef9a957f2a8af3bd4a4cad2dbc6a0de7f8a.sol):
	External calls:
	- finalization() (/unique_chucks/12/0x7a134ef9a957f2a8af3bd4a4cad2dbc6a0de7f8a.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/12/0x7a134ef9a957f2a8af3bd4a4cad2dbc6a0de7f8a.sol)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/12/0x7a134ef9a957f2a8af3bd4a4cad2dbc6a0de7f8a.sol#412-427) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/12/0x7a134ef9a957f2a8af3bd4a4cad2dbc6a0de7f8a.sol#424-425)

RakugoCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/12/0x7a134ef9a957f2a8af3bd4a4cad2dbc6a0de7f8a.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/12/0x7a134ef9a957f2a8af3bd4a4cad2dbc6a0de7f8a.sol)

RakugoCrowdsale.contribute (/unique_chucks/12/0x7a134ef9a957f2a8af3bd4a4cad2dbc6a0de7f8a.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/12/0x7a134ef9a957f2a8af3bd4a4cad2dbc6a0de7f8a.sol)

RakugoCrowdsale.presalePurchase has external calls inside a loop:
	- presalePurchaseTokens = rakugoPresale.balanceOf(presalePurchaseAddress) (/unique_chucks/12/0x7a134ef9a957f2a8af3bd4a4cad2dbc6a0de7f8a.sol#593-596)

RakugoCrowdsale.companyTokens should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x7a134ef9a957f2a8af3bd4a4cad2dbc6a0de7f8a.sol#560-564)
RakugoCrowdsale.rate should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0x7a134ef9a957f2a8af3bd4a4cad2dbc6a0de7f8a.sol#560)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/12/0x7a134ef9a957f2a8af3bd4a4cad2dbc6a0de7f8a.sol#85-86:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
